description:
Ikeda Chizuru... Chitose`s younger twin sister...Despite the summer heat, my sister diligently performs her student council duties without a single complaint. I knew she could do it. She`s amazing. As usual, she works with Sugiura-san. No matter how hot it gets, they`re always together... (drool) Oh, my sister`s laughing happily with Sugiura-san... (gush)...Hm?
...She`s back again. Why does she always interfere with my sister and Sugiura-san... Don`t come over here! Blow yourself up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Not Scared of This Summer
今年の夏はこわくない
